The uploader should have unpacked this before uploading, but you can use WinRAR to unpack the individual archives into one big video file yourself. I use Nero 7 to burn. It converts most video files.

foy, download avs video converter and convert the .avi file to dvd files.  once that is done, burn all the files in the video_ts folder that is created (there should be about 7 or 8 files, including .vob, .bup, and .ifo). the resulting disc should work in almost any dvd player
